name: 青娥 - 爬山变仙 ~Let's enjoy walls!~
name_original: 青娥 - 爬山变仙 ~Let's enjoy walls!~
description:
I love the ability to pass through walls - it's such an underused mechanic. I wanted to combine this mechanic from my previous Seiga game with the platforming from my Chimata game. The result is an incredibly acrobatic Seiga that not only phases through walls at high speed, but also clings to them and can wall-jump all day.
I wish I could become one with the walls, too: It's probably nice and cozy in there... (it's my second game jam in a row, please send help.)

Seek the mountain hermitage using the ability to pass through walls to avoid enemies and obstacles. A short platforming game with quick, non-stop action.
A Touhou Project fan game, featuring a young Seiga Kaku who has just feigned her death to escape from her mundane life and seek the mountain hermitage. Before she can become the Immortal hermit who passes through walls, she needs to master her abilities. Each level has an optional collectable - can you gather them all?

Basic controls
  • Left, Right: Move
  • Z: Jump
  • X: Pass through walls
See possibilities where others see walls

Help Seiga become one with her nature as a hermit who passes through walls.

  • Press towards a wall mid-air to cling to it
  • Press 'Z' to jump off a wall you cling to
  • Press 'X' to pass through a wall you cling to or press up against
  • Phasing through walls increases your speed and maximum speed. Your maximum speed is only reset when you touch the ground
Other controls
  • Down: Duck. It halves the size of your hurtbox.
  • Esc: Pause
  • R: Reset the level

Touhou Project original concept, characters, and other elements are the property of ZUN and Team Shanghai Alice. This game is a fanmade work made according to the official guidelines. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by the original creators.

Made as a submission to the 1st Chinese  Touhou Jam. Theme of the game: Find yourself (寻找自我).
